chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
oX: X
zX: X
mX: X -> X -> X
pX: X -> X -> X
oppX: X -> X
Y: Type
oY: Y
zY: Y
mY: Y -> Y -> Y
pY: Y -> Y -> Y
oppY: Y -> Y
phi: X -> Y
Hphi: ring_morphism
n: nat
x: M22 X

Goal:
morph22 (mscal (MU22 pX mX) (ID_22 zX oX) n x) = mscal (MU22 pY mY) (ID_22 zY oY) n (morph22 x)

Premises:
mscal : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> nat -> X -> X
M22 = fun R : Type => (R * R * R * R)%type : Type -> Type Arguments M22 _%type_scope
morph22 = fun X0 : M22 X => let (p, x) := X0 in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (a, b) := p0 in fun c d : X => (〚 a 〛, 〚 b 〛, 〚 c 〛, 〚 d 〛)) x) x : M22 X -> M22 Y
MU22 : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> M22 R -> M22 R -> M22 R
ID_22 : forall R : Type, R -> R -> M22 R
mscal_morph : forall (X Y : Type) (m1 : X -> X -> X) (u1 : X) (m2 : Y -> Y -> Y) (u2 : Y) (phi : X -> Y), phi u1 = u2 -> (forall x y : X, phi (m1 x y) = m2 (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall (n : nat) (x : X), phi (mscal m1 u1 n x) = mscal m2 u2 n (phi x)
msum_morph : forall (X Y : Type) (m1 : X -> X -> X) (u1 : X) (m2 : Y -> Y -> Y) (u2 : Y) (phi : X -> Y), phi u1 = u2 -> (forall x y : X, phi (m1 x y) = m2 (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), phi (msum m1 u1 n f) = msum m2 u2 n (fun x : nat => phi (f x))
expo22_scal : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (k : R) (n : nat) (U : M22 R), mscal (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone) n (M22scal Rmult k U) = M22scal Rmult (mscal Rmult Rone n k) (mscal (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone) n U)
MU22_morph : forall x y : M22 X, morph22 (MU22 pX mX x y) = MU22 pY mY (morph22 x) (morph22 y)
msum : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> nat -> (nat -> X) -> X
Det22_expo : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (n : nat) (x : M22 R), Det22 Rplus Rmult Ropp (mscal (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone) n x) = mscal Rmult Rone n (Det22 Rplus Rmult Ropp x)
mscal_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> mscal m u n (m x y) = m (mscal m u n x) (mscal m u n y)
mscal_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> m (mscal m u n x) y = m y (mscal m u n x)
mscal_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m (mscal m u n x) x
mscal_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (a + b) x = m (mscal m u a x) (mscal m u b x)
mscal_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m x (mscal m u n x)
mscal_mult : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (a * b) x = mscal m u a (mscal m u b x)
mscal_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall n : nat, mscal m u n u = u
Diag22_expo : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> forall (n : nat) (x y : R), mscal (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone) n (x, Rzero, Rzero, y) = (mscal Rmult Rone n x, Rzero, Rzero, mscal Rmult Rone n y)
mscal_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u x : X), mscal m u 0 x = u
mscal_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, mscal m u 1 x = x
mk_ring_morph : 〚 zX 〛 = zY -> 〚 oX 〛 = oY -> (forall x y : X, 〚 pX x y 〛 = pY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛) -> (forall x y : X, 〚 mX x y 〛 = mY 〚 x 〛 〚 y 〛) -> (forall x : X, 〚 oppX x 〛 = oppY 〚 x 〛) -> ring_morphism
sum_0n_scal : forall (X : Type) (sum : X -> X -> X) (zero : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero k (f i)) = mscal sum zero k (msum sum zero n f)
msum_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = u
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
msum_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (f : nat -> X), msum m u 0 f = u
M22mult_monoid : forall (R : Type) (Rzero Rone : R) (Rplus Rmult Rminus : R -> R -> R) (Ropp : R -> R), ring_theory Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq -> monoid_theory (MU22 Rplus Rmult) (ID_22 Rzero Rone)
PL22_morph : forall x y : M22 X, morph22 (PL22 pX x y) = PL22 pY (morph22 x) (morph22 y)
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
msum_mscal : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> m (f i) (f j) = m (f j) (f i)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => mscal m u k (f i)) = mscal m u k (msum m u n f)
scal_one : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), mscal sum zero k x = times (mscal sum zero k one) x
scal_times : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (k : nat) (x y : X), mscal sum zero k (times x y) = times x (mscal sum zero k y)
msum_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (msum m u n f) (f n)
times_zero_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall x : X, times zero x = zero
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))

```coq
unfold morph22, MU22 in |- *.
rewrite MU22_morph, expo22_scal.
rewrite <- mscal_sum, <- scal_one.
repeat rewrite mscal_plus1.
rewrite mscal_plus, mscal_S.
repeat rewrite mscal_mult, mscal_of_unit.
repeat rewrite Diag22_expo, mscal_0, mscal_1.
rewrite <- msum_mscal, <- mscal_sum.
repeat rewrite mscal_plus1, mscal_plus.
repeat rewrite mscal_S, mscal_mult.
repeat rewrite mscal_of_unit, mscal_0, mscal_1.
Qed.```
